weWillBeBack: We will be back in a bit
weWillBeBackBody: This system is currently undergoing routine maintenance to ensure you get the best experience. The maintenance is expected to continue for a few hours at most.Please check back later.
Title: Select Country Language
Change_Language: To change the language please press on country flag icon
name: Name
howItWorksIntro:
Hello! Welcome to the Operation: Falafel app... for all falafel fans and shawerma lovers!

OF family members will receive exclusive gifts! DON'T FORGET to ensure you activate your PUSH NOTIFICATIONS to hear about your REWARDS.
welcomeOF: Once you become an OF App family member, you will receive 25% discount on your first dine in or delivery order!
ofRewardsSubTitle: Enjoy 15% credit back in your wallet on all future delivery orders! T&C apply
giftVoucherSubTitle: Want to share the love? your loyalty credits can be used to buy a gift voucher & send it to a friend.
transferCreditSubTitle: You can transfer your credit to a friend or you can redeem them when you place an order for delivery, take away or dine in.
referFriendSubTitle:
Tell your friends and invite another falafel & shawerma lover to register with us and enjoy you're the reward.
Once your friend downloads the app & register, both of you will instantly receive 5DHS credit to your account.
terms&conditionsSubTitle:
- All our offers, rewards and loyalty points are registered, used and redeemed on dine-in, takeaway and delivery orders.
- All rewards, loyalty points and gifts are to be redeemed and spent at the restaurants as food or drink items.
There are no money refunds and credit cannot be exchanged for cash.
- According to the UAE law, 5% VAT will be added to all bills. The system excludes the 5% VAT, you will receive your credit on the total bill without the addition of the 5% VAT.- Offers, gifts © and promotions may be subjected to
change at any time.
- This application is owned by Operation: Falafel and all offers promotions, loyalty credits and information belong to Operation:
Falafel UAE
- Upon visit or purchase, one reward is applicable to redeem per table / order.
- Rewards can only be redeemed at the time of the purchase transaction.
- The app cannot be used in
Outlet Village.
voucherBody:
- This voucher is valid for dine in And Devlivery.
- This voucher cannot be used in conjunction with any other discount or promotion.
- This voucher is only valid at the listed locations.
- This voucher can be used one time only.
- Only one voucher can be used per table/ transaction.
validOnAppDlivery: Valid on App delivery orders only
audTitle: 20% OFF for AUD Students and staff
weLoveToHereFromYou: WE LOVE TO HERE FROM YOU
terms:
All our offers, rewards and loyalty points are registered,
used and redeemed on dine-in and takeaway orders only.

All rewards, loyalty points and gifts are to be claimed in
the following branches only: Downtown, The Beach JBR.
Motor City and Media City.

All rewards, loyalty points and gifts are to be redeemed
and spent at the restaurants as food or drink items. There
are no money refunds

According to the UAE law, 5% VAT will be added to all bills.
The system excludes the 5% VAT, you will receive points
on the total bill without the addition of the 5% VAT

Offers, gifts and promotions may be subjected to change
at any time.

This application is owned by Operation: Falafel and all
offers, promotions, loyalty points and information belong to Operation: Falafel UAE.

Upon visit or purchase, one reward is applicable to redeem per table / order.

Punch card offers will not accumulate points.
You may use
either the punch card or build up loyalty points per visit.

Rewards can only be redeemed at the time of the purchase transaction.

All wallet credit will expire on 31st
December 2020.
Members can rebuild wallet credit from 1st
January 2021.
verifyYourIdentityMsg: Please enter the One-Time Password (OTP) sent to your registered mobile number to verify your identity and continue the process
